alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 10:42AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The center of Tropical Storm Ian will emerge off of the Brevard County coast in the next hour, with historic rainfall of 12 to 18 inches reported across east central Florida. These amounts have already caused quick rises along the Saint Johns River. The forecast point at Astor is currently in Moderate Flood Stage and will reach Major Flood Stage within the next several hours. The river is forecast to crest near the Flood of Record at 4.6 feet later tonight, then decreasing toward Moderate Stage into the weekend, as north to northeast winds cause a backup at the point. Interests along the river should be prepared for major flood impacts to arrive today and tonight. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Major flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Major flooding occurs, with water entering the first story of many homes and businesses along the river. Some roads inaccessible and rescues likely needed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Thursday was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.6 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue St Johns River Astor 2.3 3.9 Thu 9 am 4.6 3.8 3.6 3.7 3.7 &&
